law.catch_line: Notice of petition for appointment of guardian or conservator.
law.text: Upon the filing of a petition for the appointment of a guardian or conservator under the provisions of this chapter, notice shall be given in like manner as is provided under existing law.
law.history: Amended 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 141, sec. 143, effective July 1, 1982. -- Created 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 25, sec. 7.
